definitions.meaning:
[usually before noun ]
connected with the natural conditions in which people, animals and plants live; connected with the environment
自然环境的；生态环境的；有关环境的

examples.content:
the environmental impact of pollution 
污染对环境的影响

an environmental group/movement (= that aims to improve or protect the natural environment) 
环境保护组织╱运动

definitions.meaning:
connected with the conditions that affect the behaviour and development of sb/sth 
（有关影响个体或事物行为或发展）环境的

examples.content:
an environmental health officer 
环境卫生检查官员
